newsitem.title: USA: No cold threat to Brazil coffee this weekend - WSC.
newsitem.headline: No cold threat to Brazil coffee this weekend - WSC.

text.p: No major cold is in sight in Brazil's coffee growing areas in the next three to five days, forecaster Weather Services Corp said.
Temperatures are forecast near normal on Friday and above normal on Saturday and through to Tuesday.
Conditions are generally favourable for the trees but some disruptions to the harvest are still expected from scattered showers.
